title: Must return an error response if the invoker is a solicitor in a different jurisdiction from that of the case
specs: U1 - with a Solicitor role for a particular jurisdiction under an organisation to create, assign and unassign access to a case for another solicitor in their organisation
U2 - with a solicitor role for a different jurisdiction within the same organisation as U1
is made by U2 and intends to unassign access to C1 for U1
